title: Torn curtains

properties.name: description
properties.value: The torn curtains can be built in the Curtain space of the Parlour, Bedroom, Dining Room, and Portal Nexus in a player-owned house. It requires 2 Construction to build and when built, it gives 132 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it. The Goblin decorations can be used on torn curtains to make Christmas curtains.

The torn curtains can be built in the Curtain space of the Parlour, Bedroom, Dining Room, and Portal Nexus in a player-owned house. It requires 2 Construction to build and when built, it gives 132 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it. The Goblin decorations can be used on torn curtains to make Christmas curtains.

The '''torn curtains''' can be built in the [[Curtain space]] of the [[Parlour]], [[Bedroom]], [[Dining Room]], and [[Portal Nexus]] in a [[player-owned house]]. It requires 2 [[Construction]] to build and when built, it gives 132 [[experience]]. The player must have a [[hammer]] and a [[saw]] in their inventory to build it. The [[Goblin decorations]] can be used on torn curtains to make Christmas curtains.
